snippet: The movie, which had 2.1 million viewers Saturday night, was the most-watched original movie on HBO in eight years.
abstract: The movie, which had 2.1 million viewers Saturday night, was the most-watched original movie on HBO in eight years.

headline.main: Palin-Focused Film 'Game Change' Draws Big Audience to HBO
headline.print_headline: McCain and Palin Lost, but Film Is a Winner
